apihelp-oathauth-webauthn-summary: API Module to communicate between server and client during registration/authentication process.
apihelp-oathauth-webauthn-param-func: Name of the requested function to be executed.
apihelp-oathauth-webauthn-param-passkeym: Whether the key being registered is in passkey mode. (Only for getRegisterInfo.)
apierror-oathauth-webauthn-module-missin: The WebAuthn module is not available.
apierror-oathauth-webauthn-invalid-crede: The credential data is invalid or malformed.
apierror-oathauth-webauthn-reauthenticat: You must first reauthenticate through Special:OATHManage before you can take this action.
apihelp-oathauth-webauthn-paramvalue-fun: Register a new WebAuthn credential for the current user.
apihelp-oathauth-webauthn-param-credenti: JSON-encoded WebAuthn credential response from the browser.
apihelp-oathauth-webauthn-param-friendly: Friendly name for the new credential.
